TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReaderWriterLock extends System.Runtime.ConstrainedExecution.CriticalFinalizerObject
Public NotInheritable Class ReaderWriterLock Inherits CriticalFinalizerObject

summary.span: 定义支持单个写线程和多个读线程的锁。

span.span: Defines a lock that supports single writers and multiple readers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 有下面两个读取器-编写器锁： 和 。The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] has two reader-writer locks, and . 建议对所有新开发的项目使用 。 is recommended for all new development. 虽然 类似于 ，但不同之处在于，前者简化了递归规则以及锁状态的升级和降级规则。 is similar to , but it has simplified rules for recursion and for upgrading and downgrading lock state. 避免了许多潜在的死锁情况。 avoids many cases of potential deadlock. 另外， 的性能显著优于 。In addition, the performance of is significantly better than . 用于对资源的访问进行同步。 is used to synchronize access to a resource. 在任何给定时间，它允许多个线程的并发读访问权限，或者单个线程的写访问权限。At any given time, it allows either concurrent read access for multiple threads, or write access for a single thread. 在资源中，很少更改的情况下`ReaderWriterLock`提供更佳的吞吐量比简单的一个每次锁定，如。In a situation where a resource is changed infrequently, a `ReaderWriterLock` provides better throughput than a simple one-at-a-time lock, such as . `ReaderWriterLock` 最适用于大多数访问的读取，而写很少和短的持续时间。`ReaderWriterLock` works best where most accesses are reads, while writes are infrequent and of short duration. 多个读取器备用与单个编写器，以便读取器和编写器都不会阻止很长一段。Multiple readers alternate with single writers, so that neither readers nor writers are blocked for long periods. > [!NOTE] > 持有很长一段的读取器锁或编写器锁将阻止其他线程。Holding reader locks or writer locks for long periods will starve other threads. 为获得最佳性能，请考虑重新构建应用程序以最大程度减少写入的持续时间。For best performance, consider restructuring your application to minimize the duration of writes. 锁定或编写器锁，但不是能同时在同一时间，线程可以持有一个读取器。A thread can hold a reader lock or a writer lock, but not both at the same time. 而不是为了获取写线程锁释放读线程锁，你可以使用和。Instead of releasing a reader lock in order to acquire the writer lock, you can use and . 递归锁请求增加锁的锁计数。Recursive lock requests increase the lock count on a lock. 单独排队读取器和编写器。Readers and writers are queued separately. 当一个线程释放写线程锁时，队列中等待的读取器在该时刻的所有线程会都授予读取器锁;当所有这些读取器锁已发布，正在编写器中的线程等待下一个队列，如果任何，被授予写线程锁，等等。When a thread releases the writer lock, all threads waiting in the reader queue at that instant are granted reader locks; when all of those reader locks have been released, the next thread waiting in the writer queue, if any, is granted the writer lock, and so on. 换而言之，`ReaderWriterLock`之间的读取器、 集合和一个编写器的替代项。In other words, `ReaderWriterLock` alternates between a collection of readers, and one writer. 时编写器队列中的线程正在等待活动的读取者锁释放，请求新的读取器锁的线程会累积读取器队列中。While a thread in the writer queue is waiting for active reader locks to be released, threads requesting new reader locks accumulate in the reader queue. 未授予他们的请求，即使它们无法与现有读线程锁拥有者; 共享的并发访问这可帮助保护对读取器的无限期阻滞进度的编写器。Their requests are not granted, even though they could share concurrent access with existing reader-lock holders; this helps protect writers against indefinite blockage by readers. 上获取锁的大多数方法`ReaderWriterLock`接受超时值。Most methods for acquiring locks on a `ReaderWriterLock` accept time-out values. 使用超时值以避免在你的应用程序的死锁。Use time-outs to avoid deadlocks in your application. 例如，线程可能会获取对一个资源的编写器锁定，然后请求上第二个资源，则将读线程锁同时，另一个线程可能会获取写线程锁上第二个资源，并请求在第一天的读取器锁定。For example, a thread might acquire the writer lock on one resource and then request a reader lock on a second resource; in the meantime, another thread might acquire the writer lock on the second resource, and request a reader lock on the first. 如果不使用超时，线程死锁。Unless time-outs are used, the threads deadlock. 如果在超时间隔过期，并且尚未授予锁请求，该方法控制权返回给调用线程引发。If the time-out interval expires and the lock request has not been granted, the method returns control to the calling thread by throwing an . 线程可以捕获此异常，并确定接下来要采取的操作。A thread can catch this exception and determine what action to take next. 超时以毫秒为单位表示。Time-outs are expressed in milliseconds. 如果你使用若要指定超时，使用的值是表示的整毫秒的总数。If you use a to specify the time-out, the value used is the total number of whole milliseconds represented by the . 下表显示了有效的超时值以毫秒为单位。The following table shows the valid time-out values in milliseconds. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |-1-1|线程等待，直到已获取锁，而不考虑了多长时间。The thread waits until the lock is acquired, regardless of how long it takes. 指定整数超时、 常量的方法可用。For methods that specify integer time-outs, the constant can be used.| |00|线程不会等待获取锁。The thread does not wait to acquire the lock. 如果不能立即获取锁，该方法返回。If the lock cannot be acquired immediately, the method returns.| |>0>0|要等待的毫秒数。The number of milliseconds to wait.| 除了-1，不允许负的超时值。With the exception of -1, negative time-out values are not allowed. 如果指定负整数而-1，则改用超时值为零。If you specify a negative integer other than -1, a time-out value of zero is used instead. （也就是说，该方法返回而不等待，如果不能立即获取锁。）如果指定表示负数，而-1 毫秒引发。(That is, the method returns without waiting, if the lock cannot be acquired immediately.) If you specify a that represents a negative number of milliseconds other than -1, is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用若要保护的共享的资源，一个整数值名为`resource`，即同时读取和写入多个线程被以独占方式。The following example demonstrates how to use a to protect a shared resource, an integer value named `resource`, that is read concurrently and written exclusively by multiple threads. 请注意，以便都可以看到所有线程在类级别声明。Note that the is declared at the class level so that it is visible to all threads. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is thread safe.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 类的新实例。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 获取读线程锁。

span.span: Acquires a reader lock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AcquireReaderLock(int32 millisecondsTimeout) cil managed

span.span: The time-out in milliseconds.

summary.span: 使用一个 超时值获取读线程锁。

span.span: Acquires a reader lock, using an value for the time-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果另一个线程持有写线程锁，或至少一个线程正在等待编写器锁块。 blocks if a different thread has the writer lock, or if at least one thread is waiting for the writer lock. > [!NOTE] > 如果当前线程已将写线程锁，没有读线程锁。If the current thread already has the writer lock, no reader lock is acquired. 相反，写线程锁上的锁计数即会递增。Instead, the lock count on the writer lock is incremented. 这会阻止线程阻止在其自己的编写器锁。This prevents a thread from blocking on its own writer lock. 结果应完全相同调用，和对的其他调用释放该编写器锁时是必需的。The result is exactly the same as calling , and an additional call to is required when releasing the writer lock. `AcquireReaderLock` 支持递归读线程锁请求。`AcquireReaderLock` supports recursive reader-lock requests. 也就是说，线程可以调用 AcquireReaderLock 多次，递增每个时间的锁计数。That is, a thread can call AcquireReaderLock multiple times, which increments the lock count each time. 必须调用对于您每次调用一次`AcquireReaderLock`。You must call once for each time you call `AcquireReaderLock`. 或者，可以调用以减少要立即零的锁计数。Alternatively, you can call to reduce the lock count to zero immediately. 递归锁请求始终立即授予而无需将读取器队列中的请求的线程。Recursive lock requests are always granted immediately, without placing the requesting thread in the reader queue. 使用递归锁时要格外小心，以避免阻止很长一段的编写器锁的请求。Use recursive locks with caution, to avoid blocking writer-lock requests for long periods. 有关有效的超时值，请参阅。For valid time-out values, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取和发布读线程锁，以及如何处理当请求超时时引发的异常。The following code example shows how to acquire and release a reader lock, and how to handle the exception thrown when a request times out. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 使用一个 超时值获取读线程锁。

span.span: Acquires a reader lock, using a value for the time-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果另一个线程持有写线程锁，或至少一个线程正在等待编写器锁块。 blocks if a different thread has the writer lock, or if at least one thread is waiting for the writer lock. > [!NOTE] > 如果当前线程已将写线程锁，没有读线程锁。If the current thread already has the writer lock, no reader lock is acquired. 相反，写线程锁上的锁计数即会递增。Instead, the lock count on the writer lock is incremented. 这会阻止线程阻止在其自己的编写器锁。This prevents a thread from blocking on its own writer lock. 结果应完全相同调用，和对的其他调用释放该编写器锁时是必需的。The result is exactly the same as calling , and an additional call to is required when releasing the writer lock. `AcquireReaderLock` 支持递归读线程锁请求。`AcquireReaderLock` supports recursive reader-lock requests. 也就是说，线程可以调用 AcquireReaderLock 多次，递增每个时间的锁计数。That is, a thread can call AcquireReaderLock multiple times, which increments the lock count each time. 必须调用对于您每次调用一次`AcquireReaderLock`。You must call once for each time you call `AcquireReaderLock`. 或者，可以调用以减少要立即零的锁计数。Alternatively, you can call to reduce the lock count to zero immediately. 递归锁请求始终立即授予而无需将读取器队列中的请求的线程。Recursive lock requests are always granted immediately, without placing the requesting thread in the reader queue. 使用递归锁时要格外小心，以避免阻止很长一段的编写器锁的请求。Use recursive locks with caution, to avoid blocking writer-lock requests for long periods. 有关有效的超时值，请参阅。For valid time-out values, see .

summary.span: 获取写线程锁。

span.span: Acquires the writer lock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AcquireWriterLock(int32 millisecondsTimeout) cil managed

span.span: The time-out in milliseconds.

summary.span: 使用一个 超时值获取写线程锁。

span.span: Acquires the writer lock, using an value for the time-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将一直阻塞如果另一个线程具有读线程锁或写线程锁。This method blocks if another thread has a reader lock or writer lock. 编写器锁交替使用具有多个并发的读取器锁的方法的说明，请参阅类。For a description of the way the writer lock alternates with multiple concurrent reader locks, see the class. 已将读线程锁的线程可以获取写线程锁在两种方式之一： 释放之前调用的读取器锁来，或通过调用。A thread that already has a reader lock can acquire the writer lock in one of two ways: by releasing the reader lock before calling , or by calling . > [!CAUTION] > 如果一个线程调用`AcquireWriterLock`虽然它仍有读线程锁，它将在其自己的读取器锁块; 如果指定无限期超时，则线程将发生死锁。If a thread calls `AcquireWriterLock` while it still has a reader lock, it will block on its own reader lock; if an infinite time-out is specified, the thread will deadlock. 若要避免这类死锁，使用以确定当前线程是否已具有读线程锁。To avoid such deadlocks, use to determine whether the current thread already has a reader lock. `AcquireWriterLock` 支持递归写线程锁请求。`AcquireWriterLock` supports recursive writer-lock requests. 也就是说，调用线程可以`AcquireWriterLock`多次，该锁计数递增 1 每次。That is, a thread can call `AcquireWriterLock` multiple times, which increments the lock count each time. 必须调用对于您每次调用一次`AcquireWriterLock`。You must call once for each time you call `AcquireWriterLock`. 或者，可以调用以减少要立即零的锁计数。Alternatively, you can call to reduce the lock count to zero immediately. 递归锁请求始终立即授予而无需编写器队列中将请求的线程。Recursive lock requests are always granted immediately, without placing the requesting thread in the writer queue. 有关有效的超时值，请参阅。For valid time-out values, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取和发布编写器锁，以及如何处理当请求超时时引发的异常。The following code example shows how to acquire and release a writer lock, and how to handle the exception thrown when a request times out. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

span.span: expires before the lock request is granted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AcquireWriterLock(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed

span.span: The specifying the time-out period.

summary.span: 使用一个 超时值获取写线程锁。

span.span: Acquires the writer lock, using a value for the time-out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将一直阻塞如果另一个线程具有读线程锁或写线程锁。This method blocks if another thread has a reader lock or writer lock. 编写器锁交替使用具有多个并发的读取器锁的方法的说明，请参阅类。For a description of the way the writer lock alternates with multiple concurrent reader locks, see the class. 已将读线程锁的线程可以获取写线程锁在两种方式之一： 释放之前调用的读取器锁来，或通过调用。A thread that already has a reader lock can acquire the writer lock in one of two ways: by releasing the reader lock before calling , or by calling . > [!CAUTION] > 如果一个线程调用`AcquireWriterLock`虽然它仍有读线程锁，它将在其自己的读取器锁块; 如果指定无限期超时，则线程将发生死锁。If a thread calls `AcquireWriterLock` while it still has a reader lock, it will block on its own reader lock; if an infinite time-out is specified, the thread will deadlock. 若要避免这类死锁，使用以确定当前线程是否已具有读线程锁。To avoid such deadlocks, use to determine whether the current thread already has a reader lock. `AcquireWriterLock` 支持递归写线程锁请求。`AcquireWriterLock` supports recursive writer-lock requests. 也就是说，调用线程可以`AcquireWriterLock`多次，该锁计数递增 1 每次。That is, a thread can call `AcquireWriterLock` multiple times, which increments the lock count each time. 必须调用对于您每次调用一次`AcquireWriterLock`。You must call once for each time you call `AcquireWriterLock`. 或者，可以调用以减少要立即零的锁计数。Alternatively, you can call to reduce the lock count to zero immediately. 递归锁请求始终立即授予而无需编写器队列中将请求的线程。Recursive lock requests are always granted immediately, without placing the requesting thread in the writer queue. 有关有效的超时值，请参阅。For valid time-out values, see .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool AnyWritersSince(int32 seqNum) cil managed
Public Function AnyWritersSince (seqNum As Integer) As Boolean

span.span: The sequence number.

summary.span: 指示获取序列号之后是否已将写线程锁授予某个线程。

span.span: Indicates whether the writer lock has been granted to any thread since the sequence number was obtained.

returns.span: 如果获取序列号之后已将写线程锁授予某一线程，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the writer lock has been granted to any thread since the sequence number was obtained; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用和`AnyWritersSince`改进应用程序性能。You can use and `AnyWritersSince` to improve application performance. 例如，一个线程可能缓存持有的读取器锁时，它获取的信息。For example, a thread might cache the information it obtains while holding a reader lock. 释放并在先锁之后, 该线程可以使用`AnyWritersSince`以决定是否其他有线程写入资源在此期间; 如果没有，可以使用缓存的信息。After releasing and later reacquiring the lock, the thread can use `AnyWritersSince` to determine whether other threads have written to the resource in the interim; if not, the cached information can be used. 此方法很有用，读取由锁保护的信息将占用大量资源;例如，运行数据库查询。This technique is useful where reading the information protected by the lock is expensive; for example, running a database query. 调用方必须顺序的序列号，才能将读线程锁或编写器锁持有。The caller must be holding a reader lock or a writer lock in order for the sequence number to be useful. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法和属性以确定另一个线程是否获取自当前线程上的受保护资源的编写器锁上次持有写线程锁。The following code example shows how to use the method and the property to determine whether another thread acquired the writer lock on the protected resource since the current thread last held the writer lock. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#6)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DowngradeFromWriterLock(valuetype System.Threading.LockCookie& lockCookie) cil managed
Public Sub DowngradeFromWriterLock (ByRef lockCookie As LockCookie)

span.span: A returned by .

summary.span: 将线程的锁状态还原为调用 前的状态。

span.span: Restores the lock status of the thread to what it was before was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 释放写线程锁，而不考虑递归锁计数，并还原才能升级到编写器锁线程持有读线程锁。 releases the writer lock, regardless of the recursive lock count, and restores the reader lock that was held by the thread before upgrading to the writer lock. 将还原读线程锁上的锁计数。The lock count on the reader lock is restored. > [!NOTE] > `DowngradeFromWriterLock` 接受通过调用获取。`DowngradeFromWriterLock` accepts a obtained by calling . 不要使用`LockCookie`返回。Do not use a `LockCookie` returned by . 线程不会阻止从写线程锁，降级时，即使其他线程在等待写线程锁，因为所有的读取器锁请求被授予权限时编写器锁被释放。A thread does not block when downgrading from the writer lock, even if other threads are waiting for the writer lock, because all reader-lock requests are granted when the writer lock is released. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何请求读线程锁，将读取器锁升级为写线程锁，并再次降级到将读线程锁。The following code example shows how to request a reader lock, upgrade the reader lock to a writer lock, and downgrade to a reader lock again. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

summary.span: 确保垃圾回收器回收 对象时释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 垃圾回收器调用时当前对象已准备好完成。The garbage collector calls when the current object is ready to be finalized.

[!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the current thread holds the writer lock.

value.span: 如果当前线程持有写线程锁，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current thread holds the writer lock; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示在尝试获取对具有编写器锁的线程的读取器锁时`ReaderWriterLock`不会授予读线程锁，但改为递增写线程锁上的锁计数。The following code example demonstrates that when an attempt is made to acquire a reader lock on a thread that has a writer lock, `ReaderWriterLock` does not grant the reader lock but instead increments the lock count on the writer lock. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock.IsWriterLockHeld/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.LockCookie ReleaseLock() cil managed

summary.span: 释放锁，不管线程获取锁的次数如何。

span.span: Releases the lock, regardless of the number of times the thread acquired the lock.

returns.span: 一个 值，表示释放的锁。

span.span: A value representing the released lock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 释放读线程锁或写线程锁，而不考虑递归锁计数。 releases the reader lock or writer lock, regardless of the recursive lock count. 若要还原的锁，包括锁计数，状态将传递到。To restore the state of the lock, including the lock count, pass the to . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来释放锁后的，无论多少次它已获取线程，以及如何还原锁更高版本的状态。The following code example shows how to use the method to release the lock, regardless of how many times it has been acquired by the thread, and how to restore the state of the lock later. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#6)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReleaseReaderLock() cil managed

summary.span: 减少锁计数。

span.span: Decrements the lock count.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 减少锁计数。 decrements the lock count. 在计数变为零时，被释放锁。When the count reaches zero, the lock is released. > [!NOTE] > 如果线程持有写线程锁，则调用`ReleaseReaderLock`具有相同的效果与调用。If a thread has the writer lock, calling `ReleaseReaderLock` has the same effect as calling . 如果线程已无锁，则调用`ReleaseReaderLock`引发。If a thread has no locks, calling `ReleaseReaderLock` throws an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取和发布读线程锁，以及如何处理当请求超时时引发的异常。The following code example shows how to acquire and release a reader lock, and how to handle the exception thrown when a request times out. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#3)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ReleaseWriterLock() cil managed

summary.span: 减少写线程锁上的锁计数。

span.span: Decrements the lock count on the writer lock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 减少写线程锁计数。 decrements the writer lock count. 当计数达到零时，将写线程锁被释放。When the count reaches zero, the writer lock is released. > [!NOTE] > 如果线程持有读线程锁或没有锁，则调用`ReleaseWriterLock`引发。If a thread has a reader lock, or no locks, calling `ReleaseWriterLock` throws an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取和发布编写器锁，以及如何处理当请求超时时引发的异常。The following code example shows how to acquire and release a writer lock, and how to handle the exception thrown when a request times out. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#4)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

span.span: The thread does not have the writer lock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RestoreLock(valuetype System.Threading.LockCookie& lockCookie) cil managed
Public Sub RestoreLock (ByRef lockCookie As LockCookie)

span.span: A returned by .

summary.span: 将线程的锁状态还原为调用 前的状态。

span.span: Restores the lock status of the thread to what it was before calling .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还原的状态`RestoreLock`包括递归锁计数。The state restored by `RestoreLock` includes the recursive lock count. 如果它尝试还原读线程锁，另一个线程获取写线程锁之后, 或如果它尝试还原将写线程锁后获取另一个线程的读取器锁或编写器锁线程将阻止。A thread blocks if it tries to restore a reader lock after another thread has acquired the writer lock, or if it tries to restore the writer lock after another thread has acquired a reader lock or writer lock. 因为`RestoreLock`不接受超时，您需要采取措施以避免可能出现死锁。Because `RestoreLock` does not accept a time-out, you should take care to avoid possible deadlocks. > [!CAUTION] > 之前调用`RestoreLock`，请确保已释放之后调用获取的所有锁。Before calling `RestoreLock`, make sure you have released all locks acquired since the call to . 例如，线程死锁，就获取读线程锁，，然后尝试还原的更早版本的编写器锁。For example, a thread deadlocks if it acquires a reader lock, and then attempts to restore an earlier writer lock. 使用和来检测此类额外的锁。Use and to detect such additional locks. 不要使用从返回。Do not use a returned from . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来释放锁后的，无论多少次它已获取线程，以及如何还原锁更高版本的状态。The following code example shows how to use the method to release the lock, regardless of how many times it has been acquired by the thread, and how to restore the state of the lock later. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#6)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

span.span: The address of is a null pointer.

summary.span: 将读线程锁升级为写线程锁。

span.span: Upgrades a reader lock to the writer lock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.LockCookie UpgradeToWriterLock(int32 millisecondsTimeout) cil managed
Public Function UpgradeToWriterLock (millisecondsTimeout As Integer) As LockCookie

span.span: The time-out in milliseconds.

summary.span: 使用一个 超时值将读线程锁升级为写线程锁。

span.span: Upgrades a reader lock to the writer lock, using an value for the time-out.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当线程调用`UpgradeToWriterLock`释放读线程锁，而不考虑的锁计数，和线程将转到编写器锁队列的末尾。When a thread calls `UpgradeToWriterLock` the reader lock is released, regardless of the lock count, and the thread goes to the end of the queue for the writer lock. 因此，其他线程可能会写入之前请求升级被授予写线程锁的线程资源。Thus, other threads might write to the resource before the thread that requested the upgrade is granted the writer lock. > [!IMPORTANT] > 之前调用的线程不会引发超时异常方法可以重新获取读线程锁。The time-out exception is not thrown until the thread that called the method can reacquire the reader lock. 如果没有其他线程等待编写器锁，这将立即发生。If there are no other threads waiting for the writer lock, this happens immediately. 但是，如果另一个线程将排队，等待将写线程锁，该线程调用的函数直到所有当前读取器已释放其持有的锁，和一个线程已获取并释放写线程锁，方法不能重新获取读线程锁。However, if another thread is queued for the writer lock, the thread that called the method cannot reacquire the reader lock until all current readers have released their locks, and one thread has acquired and released the writer lock. 这是 true，即使另一个线程请求的编写器锁请求它后与当前线程调用方法。This is true even if the other thread that requested the writer lock requested it after the current thread called the method. 若要还原的锁定状态，调用使用返回`UpgradeToWriterLock`。To restore the lock state, call using the returned by `UpgradeToWriterLock`. 不使用此`LockCookie`与。Do not use this `LockCookie` with . 当线程必须没有读线程锁时，不要使用`UpgradeToWriterLock`。When a thread has no reader lock, do not use `UpgradeToWriterLock`. 请改用 。Use instead. 有关有效的超时值，请参阅。For valid time-out values, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何请求读线程锁，将读取器锁升级为写线程锁，并再次降级到将读线程锁。The following code example shows how to request a reader lock, upgrade the reader lock to a writer lock, and downgrade to a reader lock again. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#5)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]

exception.span: 在授予锁定请求前过期。

span.span: expires before the lock request is granted.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Threading.LockCookie UpgradeToWriterLock(valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Function UpgradeToWriterLock (timeout As TimeSpan) As LockCookie

span.span: The specifying the time-out period.

summary.span: 使用一个 超时值将读线程锁升级为写线程锁。

span.span: Upgrades a reader lock to the writer lock, using a value for the time-out.
A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当线程调用`UpgradeToWriterLock`释放读线程锁，而不考虑的锁计数，和线程将转到编写器锁队列的末尾。When a thread calls `UpgradeToWriterLock` the reader lock is released, regardless of the lock count, and the thread goes to the end of the queue for the writer lock. 因此，其他线程可能会写入之前请求升级被授予写线程锁的线程资源。Thus, other threads might write to the resource before the thread that requested the upgrade is granted the writer lock. > [!IMPORTANT] > 之前调用的线程不会引发超时异常方法可以重新获取读线程锁。The time-out exception is not thrown until the thread that called the method can reacquire the reader lock. 如果没有其他线程等待编写器锁，这将立即发生。If there are no other threads waiting for the writer lock, this happens immediately. 但是，如果另一个线程将排队，等待将写线程锁，该线程调用的函数直到所有当前读取器已释放其持有的锁，和一个线程已获取并释放写线程锁，方法不能重新获取读线程锁。However, if another thread is queued for the writer lock, the thread that called the method cannot reacquire the reader lock until all current readers have released their locks, and one thread has acquired and released the writer lock. 这是 true，即使另一个线程请求的编写器锁请求它后与当前线程调用方法。This is true even if the other thread that requested the writer lock requested it after the current thread called the method. 若要还原的锁定状态，调用使用返回`UpgradeToWriterLock`。To restore the lock state, call using the returned by `UpgradeToWriterLock`. 不使用此`LockCookie`与。Do not use this `LockCookie` with . 当线程必须没有读线程锁时，不要使用`UpgradeToWriterLock`。When a thread has no reader lock, do not use `UpgradeToWriterLock`. 请改用 。Use instead. 有关有效的超时值，请参阅。For valid time-out values, see .

exception.span: 在授予锁定请求前过期。

span.span: expires before the lock request is granted.

exception.span: 可指定 -1 毫秒以外的任何负值。

span.span: specifies a negative value other than -1 milliseconds.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WriterSeqNum As Integer
public: property int WriterSeqNum { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前序列号。

span.span: Gets the current sequence number.
The current sequence number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列数目增加时线程获取写线程锁。The sequence number increases whenever a thread acquires the writer lock. 你可以保存的序列号，并将其传递到在更高版本时，如果你想要确定其他线程是否已在此期间获取写线程锁。You can save the sequence number and pass it to at a later time, if you want to determine whether other threads have acquired the writer lock in the meantime. 你可以使用`WriterSeqNum`改进应用程序性能。You can use `WriterSeqNum` to improve application performance. 例如，一个线程可能缓存持有的读取器锁时，它获取的信息。For example, a thread might cache the information it obtains while holding a reader lock. 在先锁再释放之后，线程可以确定其他线程具有对资源通过调用编写`AnyWritersSince`; 如果没有，可以使用缓存的信息。After releasing and later reacquiring the lock, the thread can determine whether other threads have written to the resource by calling `AnyWritersSince`; if not, the cached information can be used. 此方法很有用，当读取由锁保护的信息将占用大量资源;例如，运行数据库查询。This technique is useful when reading the information protected by the lock is expensive; for example, running a database query. 调用方必须顺序的序列号，才能将读线程锁或编写器锁持有。The caller must be holding a reader lock or a writer lock in order for the sequence number to be useful. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性和方法来确定自当前线程中另一个线程是否获取对受保护资源的编写器锁定上次持有写线程锁。The following code example shows how to use the property and the method to determine whether another thread acquired the writer lock on the protected resource since the current thread last held the writer lock. 此代码摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#2)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#6)] [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CPP/source.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/CS/source.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ReaderWriterLock#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ReaderWriterLock/VB/source.vb#7)]
